item.title: Keith Olbermann blogging about the Ohio recount and irregularities
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: A presidential vote recount in Ohio seems inevitable today with the announcement from Green Party candidate David Cobb that he and the Libertarians' Michael Badnarik have raised $150,000 in donations to meet filing fees and expenses. If you'd like to support the effort visit the Cobb/LaMarche '04 website.
